channel.title: Hackers
channel.description:
Do you enjoy having a hacker ruin your favorite game...? Hackers ruin it all.. For everyone Watch this video I recorded and yes I was lagging I never lag so idk why, but the thing he did was impossible in the game
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7h6_OrDYsPA[/youtube]
He is fly hacking cause hes so noob he always dies in ghost mode he did this so he couldn't die, half his team hacked in that game Would you like people like this ruining your favorite game? it took me like 4 months to get to lvl 80

item.title: Hackers
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

yeah i like it personally, it adds challenge to online games that are too easy
